Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Total SF: 12,225 SF available for sale

− 121 Market Street: 2,225 SF 0.085 acres
− 125 Market Street: 10,000 SF 0.112 acres

+ Zoning: DT-1
+ Properties currently have tax exempt status
+ Deed Restrictions have been lifted by seller to allow buyers to seek
alternative uses (i.e. multifamily, office, non-profit, retail, etc.)
+ Location: Located near the intersection of Interstate 84 and Interstate 91
along Market Street in Downtown Hartford
+ Asking Price: $250,000

16,001 SF - FLEX BUILDING

30 Shield Street is a well-appointed 16,001 SF flex industrial property situated on 1.11 acres in an IG zone on the West Hartford/Newington line. Owned and occupied by Center Enterprises Inc. for several decades, this well cared for building has recently undergone over $200K of renovation work including a new roof, HVAC & furnace, and windows. 

The property is ideal for a user buyer. The interior configuration includes 1,540 SF office space on the first floor with an additional 1,580 SF on the second floor (combination of open and hard-walled offices) overlooking a bright open warehouse floor with access to five interior dock-height loading doors. There is a leveler and automatic door servicing the loading area. The building is fully heated and air conditioned throughout making for a comfortable work environment. Bus bars are located around the entire building, which have heavy 1600 amp 3-phase power. The exterior lot has plenty of room for parking and/or outside. 

This property is a rare find in West Hartford with many ideal upgrades. NNN costs, including real estate taxes, are just under $2.00/SF. IG zone permits various uses including manufacturing, flex, industrial, retail, and outside storage.

• AVAILABLE SPACE
First Floor: 1,540 SF office
Second Floor: 1,580 SF office
Warehouse Space: 12,881 SF

• LOCATED: Opportunity Zone (IG) zone in West Hartford

• FOR SALE: $1,440,090

For sale 5,330 SF of flex space at 65 North Plains Industrial Road Unit in Wallingford, Connecticut. This is an deal plug & play opportunity. With 2,840 SF on the first floor and 2,490 SF on the second floor. Built in 2008, 65 North Plain Industrial Road provides easy access to Route 15 (Exit 66) and Interstate 91 (Exit 15).
The office area has computer storage; the warehouse area has networking wiring throughout with network cabinets. The building offers fiber in the space provided by Frontier, Crown Castle (formerly Fiber-tech) and Comcast; 128 strands each dedicated in cabinet; Two 5-ton Liebert CRAC for server room, one 2.5 ton split unit for power/network room and two 5-ton AC/furnace units with condenser fans with a 50 KW natural gas generator and automatic transfer switch and UPS.
